title.narrative: PLANNING, MONITORING AND EVALUATION

description.narrative: Business: Secure corporate partnerships: by strengthening existing relationships and building new partnerships we will raise Baht 207 million over the 4 years and developed a range of shared value relationships linked to the individual giving targets (CP2P)., which contributes to Building Capacity For Evaluation, Cross-Sectoral - Monitoring, Data And Situation Analyses, Cross-Sectoral - Planning And Programme Reviews, Cross-Sectoral Monitoring, Data And Situation Analyses, Cross-Sectoral Planning And Programme Reviews, Evaluation, Research. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Data, Research, Evaluation And Knowledge Management, Evaluations, Research And Data, Operational Support To Programme Delivery. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Country Programme is efficiently designed, coordinated, managed and supported to meet quality programming standards in achieving results for children

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Business: Secure corporate partnerships: by strengthening existing relationships and building new partnerships we will raise Baht207 million over the 4 years and developed a range of shared value relationships linked to the individual giving targets (CP2P).

description.narrative: The year 2021 was important for Programme Planning, Monitoring, Reporting, and Evaluation as the current country programme cycle came to an end and for the development of new CPD 2022-2026. Thorough review and planning based on Results Based Management contributed to assess and reflect on the achievements, challenges, and gaps and to identify priorities for the next 5 years aligned with the National Priorities. The CO also conducted a CP evaluation focusing on partnerships which objectively delivered accurate insights to promote accountability and learning and improve the CO strategic positioning in Thailand. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:30/01/2022
